About

What is Data Science

Data science combines math and statistics, specialized programming, advanced analytics, artificial intelligence (AI), and machine learning with specific subject matter expertise to uncover actionable insights hidden in an organizationâ€™s data. These insights can be used to guide decision-making and strategic planning. IBM 'What is Data Science'

Source code

This site is based on the Bedford lab website, which makes available the codes from their site in GitHub. In that site there is a good description of how it works and a list of derived sites, such as ours.
